p: 12. The primacy of ex-sistential analysis. In § 6 (SZ 17b) we said that our analysis of the intelligibility of being is distinct from a philosophical anthropology (although it can make important contributions to that) and comes before all ontic science dealing with the human. In the following section we distinguish our endeavor from such sciences (e.g. lpsychology anthropology, biology) and further clarify its necessity.
